gear-keep-output.description: Don't delete output.  Output is always zipped into a single file for easy download.  Choose this option to prevent output deletion after zipping.

gear-log-to-file.description: Instead of logging in real time, save log output of fMRIPrep to the file output/log#.txt (where # is 1 or 2 depending on how many times fMRIPrep was run.

gear-save-intermediate-output.description: Gear will save ALL intermediate output into fmriprep_work_*.zip

gear-writable-dir.description: Gears expect to be able to write temporary files in /flywheel/v0/.  If this location is not writable (such as when running in Singularity), this path will be used instead.  fMRIPrep creates a large number of files so this disk space should be fast and local.

task-id.description: select a specific task to be processed
